author: Russ Bynum / AP
title: After a Georgia Mayor Closed Beaches to Stop Crowds, the Governor Reopened Them
description: The clash has thrust tiny Tybee Island, Ga., into a thorny debate: How much can officials curtail freedoms during the coronavirus crisis?
content: (SAVANNAH, Ga.) — A small coastal city in Georgia that thrives on tourism closed its beach, fearing carefree crowds of teenagers and college students posed too great a risk for spreading the new coronavirus. Two weeks later, the state’s governor has reversed … [+5333 chars]
